page.title: 04TWINNING ASSOCIATION
page.content: The Seneley Green twinning association was formed 6 years ago in 1979,because people thought it would be nice to know more about a foreign country.The twin town is called Nienhagen,it is near Celle in Germany. To decide which town to twin with there was a vote in which all the public could join.It was Germany that won the vote that's why we are twinned with them.The public think it's good experience having German's in their house.The houses in Germany have cellars and are different from our houses.The Germans think that Garswood is alright.The dancing school and swimming club have visited Germany once.The association think that it's a good idea being twinned with a foreign town because you learn each others values and see how they live.The association is now very sucessful.
